main: ^In faraway Brazil, there lived a capybara named Cappy.
^All was well with her, except for one thing, nothing could make her laugh or even smile.
^And so passed the capybara's grey days.
^One dreary evening Cappy sat on the river bank and decided it was time to do something about it, so the capybara set off on a journey to find something funny.
^As Cappy walked along the river, she thought hard about her misfortune.
^She was brought out of her thoughts by a growling in her stomach, the capybara remembered that she hadn't even eaten anything for the last couple of days.
^She looked around and noticed an orange tree ahead, she decided to eat a juicy orange and walked towards the tree.
^As she approached the tree, the capybara was blocked by a huge crocodile that had crawled out of the river.
